name: Rubber Grip Screwdriver
description: Premium materials, Screwdriver bar made of 6150 chromium vanadium steel, stronger and tougher than most carbon steel.

name: Magnetic Screwdriver
description: Ideal for home improvement tasks and are a perfect addition to any tool kit. Made of high-quality materials for extreme durability and ruggedness

name: Slotted Straight Tipped Screwdriver
description: High-performance alloy steel blade with chrome plating, entirely hardened for high protection against corrosion, long life tool.

name: Pozidriv Screwdriver
description: Easy to choose the right tip with the colour-coded handle and permanent symbol on the domed end  for high protection against corrosion.

name: Stanely Screwdriver
description: Ergonomic non-slip and soft handle which is made of pp+tpr materials, let you feel soft and comfortable at work.

name: Yellow Screwdriver
description: Three-component handle for maximum user comfort, soft material with ridged surface provides superior grip and greater force transmission.
